description: Black and white, self published comic.
First issue in the three part limited series, this issue brings the origin of Theown story.
name: Flight from Tomorrow

description: Third and last installment of the limited series.
name: Planet of Shattered Time

description: Final issue.

1st edition with black and white cover produced by ACED Comics.
2nd edition with full color cover produced by CA Comics.
This third issue was produced by CA Comics. Full color cover, black and white interior pages.
Origin story of the Robot Ronin. Full color cover, internal pages in black and white.
The parody that boldly goes where no elf has gone before.
name: Part 1 of 2

description:
The first project from their groundbreaking five-year deal at Image will have Brubaker and Phillips fans, old and new, at the edge of their seats, as they weave an epic crime story unlike anything they've done before.

Hollywood - 1948. A noir film stuck in endless reshoots. A writer plagued with nightmares from the war and a dangerous secret. An up-and-coming starlet's suspicious death. And a maniacal Studio Mogul and his Security Chief who will do anything to keep the cameras rolling before the Post-War boom days come crashing down. THE FADE OUT is the most ambitious series yet from the award-winning Noir Masters.

Bonus: This 40-PAGE FIRST ISSUE features more story pages, as well as exclusive back pages articles that are only in these single issues!
name: The Wild Party

description:
Introductions part 2

As fear spreads nationally, Black Ice races to rescue the hostages in a Philadelphia subway. All the while, the Red Cell's ominous agenda continues to unravel.
name: Introductions Part 2

description: Things heat up fast for the guys. Boots has a new boss and a galactic warlord named Drek Dreymore is in pursuit of a powerful amulet a certain little green guy has in his possession. Did we mention Sleesharks?! This is the Boots & Pup everyone will talk about!
The heat is on as a fire breaks out at Turbo Pizza. The Dragon faces off with his nemesis from PizzaSaurus. And the cops and pizza boys clash.

Papercuts

Bunk #3 (Papercuts) starts off with our heroes Max and his spherically-altered-other-half once again traversing the celestial planes. Upon falling victim to an elaborate and deviant interstellar floral booby trap, Max is forced through an esoteric journey deep within his psyche. Will Max be fortunate enough to escape the fiery tentacled clutches of enlightenment, or is it curtains for our silvery-backed simian?
name: Papercuts

description:
The Infinite

Set adrift in the parallel spirit world, recently deceased Porter Graemes begins to learn what it means to be incorporeal. A mysterious and unsettling fellow specter offers him a warning:

This business is an a-bomb.

Life and Death are drawn towards each other like moths to flame, but there is little that Porter can do for his grieving family. His troubles however are merely beginning...
name: The Infinite

description:
The Dreamventures!

Carl and Zip are stranded in the ancient dinosaur and dino-bug filled Cretaceous. But now they must rest. And in sleep comes Dreamventures!
name: The Dreamventures!

volume.name: Carl and Zip's Adventures Through Time!

description: The Sensational G-Girl returns for an all-new adventure! Also in this issue, the classic second chapter of "Icicle: The Movie"
name: Icicle: The Movie Part Deux; Candid Camera

description: It's the penultimate chapter of Sparkplug's classic adventure in Germany, as she comes face-to-face with her long-lost brother. And Doctor Arcane stars in the brand-new adventure, "Throwed.".
name: The Testament of Tomas Gottmann

description: Secrets are revealed in the thrilling conclusion to the origin of the Huntsman. Also in this issue, a brand-new adventure starring the fabulous Flying Fox!
name: Resolutions

description: Enjoy two classic tales of the Huntsman, as he takes on the very first incarnation of the League of Enemies!
name: New Friends Old Enemies

description:
The Lords of Hell

DOUBLE BARREL have descended on the LORDS OF HELL like two giant, stoned locusts and the consequences will be biblical!

Narcissism be damned! When you're responsible for the fate of humanity you operate on the HIGHEST level, which is where we find our two heroes Colt Buckshot and Jackson Dupagne.

The stakes have never been HIGHER. Read on as DB redefine risk and get down with a mystically ancient Chinese pervert, obviously.

Wonderful surprises, intricate secrets and fantastical revelations weave their way into this lovely little yarn.
name: The Lords of Hell

description:
Rats In The Maze

As Dobbs and Anna make their way through Mech City they begin to question whether they are any closer to freedom, or whether they are merely unwitting test subjects... rats in a maze...
name: Rats In The Maze

description: There are two blasts from the past in this issue, as the Tigress faces the twin threats of Harpyra and Dark Malice. Also in this issue, a solo adventure featuring Felicity Bliss.
name: Past Haunts

description: The Enforcer returns from exile, forcing the Outcaste to choose sides: will the young gladiators remain loyal to Prophet or join Enforcer in his quest for power? Amid the turmoil, Prophet arranges to meet with a Dome official in hopes of making peace, but can the Dome government be trusted.

Tales Of Gasp

They're still making them?! YES! Back again whether you like it or not, it's Freestyle! and this time it's 10!

Created by Australian, Mark Pursell, and his pencils, pens and paper, Freestyle is a comic series that is wonderful and lovely.

In this issue, conclusions are un-concluded as Guinea Pigs, Lasagna and Gunther set forth to find the creator of the Book Of Freestyle. Stupid Cat, Emily, Sox, Paws and Cactus follow them hoping to acquire the Guinea Pigs flying car and unwittingly enter a plot to save the creator from whatever the plan is. Norman, Mr Fishy and Devil follow Stupid and the gang to try and get back at them for leaving them behind. Then other stuff happens.

Enjoy!
name: Tales Of Gasp

description: Susan and Daisy are drawn to the hand-wringing outpost of Indie Society, while Esther ends up somewhere a lot more dangerous.

Holiday Road

In which Carol rides an elephant and needs to learn the meaning of tact.
name: Holiday Road

description:
The Bombshell Experiment

In aftermath of "Eye of the Beholder" Lucy and Solomon try to return to their normal lives. So why is Lucy suddenly on the cover of every magazine in Solar City? Just what is the "Bombshell Experiment?" And what does this all have to do with the fiendish Cult of Adonis? Find out here, in an all-new story by Halloween Man stalwart Sergio Calvet.

Also in this issue is "Necromantic" a cult-classic tale from DC Comics superstar Nicola Scott. Plus, a creepy tale of holiday horror and vampire pumpkins drawn by Michael Henderson.
name: The Bombshell Experiment; Necromantic

description: The all-new Giant returns in a brand-new adventure, "The Hammer of Hell." Also in this issue, it's all-out action at the San Diego Comic Con as Eternity Smith faces the threat of Emmanuel.
name: The Hammer of Hell

description: Enjoy a brand-new chapter in the adventures of Aphrodite, Goddess of Love. Also in this issue, a brand-new adventure of the Fantastic Girl.

It's all-out action at the San Diego Comic Con in the thrilling conclusion to the battle between Eternity Smith and the terrorist known as Emmanuel. Also in this issue, a brand-new Fantastic Girl mini-adventure.

Acrimonious Amusement Attendees of Doom

When a brand new candy bar, called Snakatak, starts turning people into zombies in the small town of Sweetooth, it is up to Clea Brown and her ragtag group of friends to stop the evil Yumzy Corporation from raining down the Sugarpocalypse. Candy chaos continues in Issue 4 of HFZ as our heros delve deeper into the heart of Yumzyland, the treat themed amusement park, now overrun with zombies! Experience corporate malfeasance explained, mascots eating mascots, and even more lollipop decapitations!
name: Acrimonious Amusement Attendees of Doom

description:
Scorned

Our hero's truth grows more confounding, his lies more suffocating. And his girlfriend's secret begins to unravel. Meanwhile, the global influence of Tryum Corp's dying CEO is on full display, even as his second in command moves against him.
name: Scorned

description:
In My Room

Between fighting psychotic criminals, Joyce half-heartedly continues to work on her master's thesis and watches too much television before stumbling upon a mysterious document.
name: In My Room

description:
A day at the carnival is the perfect outing for good ol Jughead! Funnel cakes, cotton candy, giant lollipops, corn dogs, and Ethel in a giant turtle suit? Ethels volunteered to run as mascot in the carnival fun run, and shes challenged Jughead to compete! If she wins, Jughead has to take her out to the movies, and dinner, and a bunch of other things that Jughead wouldnt be caught dead doing! Well, no problem, right? Jughead can outrun a teen girl in a turtle suit even if there is all kinds of free food being given away on the race track Find out what happens in The Old Shell Game, the lead story in this summery issue of Jughead & Archie Jumbo Comics Digest!

Note: The digital edition (8/13/2014) for this issue was released before the print edition.
name: The Old Shell Game Or: A Hair-Brained Turtle Race

description:
Pale's journey continues, with new revelations about his powers and the price he pays for wielding such unnatural forces.

Mala and Thane continue their search for Pale and confront a head hunter looking to collect the price on Pale's head.

Meanwhile, the Mandrill Captain Brutus, and his army get closer to finding Pale with each passing day!
name: Rise of the Ape King Chapter Four

description:
IDWs original sci-fi/military drama continues! Know your enemy! A top-secret recovery mission explodes into deadly betrayal and Marcus Fall finds himself battling for his life against a most unexpected foe.

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverCasey Maloney (a) & Dusty Yee (c)1
SubSubscription CoverPhil Hester (a) & Esther Sanz (c)2

Note: The digital edition (8/13/2014) for this issue was released before the print edition.
name: Chapter Two: Sacrifice

description: A secret society of Magicians must unravel the mystery of how the founder's estranged son came into possession of a book of magic, rumored to hold clues to the end of the world.
name: Order of Wormwood

description:
The eight heroes travel through the Outlands, on their quest to find the Legend Beasts, when the Eagles' Castle comes under attack from the Bats! Laval and his friends take on the bats, but Eagle warrior Equila crashes his Ultra Striker in a tree. Hanging precariously, the vehicle threatens to crash on the village of the skunks. Fellow Eagle Eris is faced with a dilemma: she can either use the Eagles remaining CHI orbs to fight the bats, or to save the skunk village. Which decision is the right one? Also featuring three more stories starring Laval, Cragger, and the rest of the warriors of Chima!

Note: The digital edition (8/13/2014) for this volume was released before the print edition.
name: The Right Decision

description:
Hic Sunt Dracones

Over a century ago, in The Neverlands, Peter, Tink, Cap'n James and Wendy Darling battle an ancient evil.
name: Hic Sunt Dracones

description:
Black Beauty

Josh Trujillo's LOVE MACHINES returns for two more stories of romance and technology. Wheels are turning and changing the world!

IN THIS ISSUE: A small Colorado family's way of life is threatened by the latest invention: A bicycle! ALSO: Can Raj overcome temptation long enough to win the big pinball tournament?

Featuring art by Ben Bishop and JB Wolfe!
name: Black Beauty

description:
Compromise

Not knowing who to trust, Machiavella bets it all on Agent Morris, the man whose been tracking her since his father's death. Will he turn her in once he's used her to get to her handlers? This is the conclusion of the first story arc for M3. Cover art by Rick Buckler.
name: Compromise

description: In color for the first time, the She-Bat takes on the Tigress! Also in this issue, Mister No stars in "Violent Friends."
name: A Lesson In Humility; Violent Friends

description: The mastermind has been identified, and the trio of killers sets out to make him answer their questions and pay for his sins. But can they find him before someone else beats them to the kill?
As Alanis struggles to escape the Abyss, the rest of the Neverminds team deal with the attack on Henko. Many secrets are revealed and an ending more shocking than last issue!
The last battleground. Featuring Captain America, Thor, and Daredevil! Plus, this special edition features bonus content including inked and pencil pages!
name: Nick Fury vs The World

description:
A Gun in Act One

The Straw Man threatened Penny's friends and family, taunting her into making some drastic decisions. She hasn't been able to banish him, so she runs away from home with the hopes that it will protect the people that she loves. The Ghost Librarian surprises Penny with a place to stay, but the Straw Man has grown so powerful that even protection spells and incantations don't hold him back. The Ghost Librarian does what she can to protect Penny, but it's only a matter of time before he returns. Meanwhile, Clarence the cat discovers a strange connection between the Librarian and Penny's father...
name: A Gun In Act One

description:
Walls

The boy lived his life like everyone else: wake up, go to work, get sleep, rinse, repeat.

That's all he had, and that was fine, until he met four strange gentleman that didn't fit in his knowledge of how the world works.

The Trashmen gather strange things made by long forgotten civilizations, and the robots that rule the city knows exactly their value.
name: Walls

description:
Manga Contents

  • Mr. Bird

The life of a successful functionary Timur has turned upside down when he is diagnosed with brain tumor. Illness and fate lead him to a Gypsy camp where an old witch implants the soul of a Gypsy baron's murdered son into his body. Now Timur has only 40 days to find out who killed the young Gypsy to keep his own soul. Meanwhile his new gypsy soul is getting stronger and Timur's bond with reality weakens.

Throughout the decades, The Shadow has served as a timeless agent of justice, bringing death and disaster to tyrants and criminals alike. During the decadent 1980s, this mysterious Master of Men faced perhaps his deadliest opponents yet: the Seven Deadly Finns, a crime family gripping New York City in a stranglehold. When The Shadow's network of agents applies pressure to their vast operations, the Finn brothers push back, enlisting serial killers and terrorists into their ranks. The violence escalates, leading to an explosive confrontation atop the Empire State Building and a shock ending which no one - not even The Shadow - could know!
name: The Seven Deadly Finns, Part 5: Dark Shadows

description:
Die Hard screenwriter Steven E. de Souza's critically acclaimed reboot of Will Eisner's Sheena, Queen of the Jungle continues in this action packed series! The trail of both half-human footprints and all too-human victims is leading hunters right back to Rachel Caldwell (AKA Sheena's) remote jungle estate - and the race is on: Can the Jungle Queen uncover the secrets of the Jaguar Men death cult before Colonel Pinto and the Val Verde secret police close their own trap - on her?

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
ACover AJake Minor (a) & Kevin Minor (c)Missing
B1:5 Cover BMark Sparacio1
C1:5 Cover CValarie Jones2
name: Return of the Jaguar Men Part Three

description:
Team-Up Part Five

With the teams assembled Branch and Enormous experiment with their new suits while Splendour and swift attempt to reconcile their relationship!
name: Team-Up Part Five

description:
Day 2: The Glacier, Slheimajkull

I took a short (three and a half days!) trip to Iceland in December 2012. Since then, I've been working on this comic/travelogue. As of this writing - just over a year later, in January 2014 - I've completed days 1 and 2, and day 3 is in progress.

This book covers the second day of my trip. You can keep reading about my adventures at my site, www.LonnieComics.com, where I update twice a week: on Mondays and Fridays.

I hope you enjoy it! And let me know what you think. : )

Lonnie
name: Day 2: The Glacier, Slheimajkull

description:
The Millionaire's Super Summer

Why are there so many costumed crime fighters who come from privileged backgrounds? Do they do it from an over abundance of philanthropic energy? Crippling emotional baggage? What? Find out in "the Millionaire's Super Summer."
name: The Millionaire's Super Summer

description:
It appears that Catalina Jones isn't the only one with superpowers. A new and seemingly unstoppable menace suddenly rises from the bottom of the sea, bringing pain and total destruction in her wake. This villain conceals a monumental truth about the fabric of the universe itself-and she holds the key to Catalina's abilities. Catalina must find the courage to challenge her before she destroys the entire world.

Collects To The Power Against chapters 7-10.
name: Vol. 2

description: The Solar Guard faces the robotic ships of the One State, in a battle near Jupiter. At the same time, Tom and Roger must disobey orders to rescue Astro from a heroic but deadly decision. Space opera excitement from Bill Spangler, writer, and John DaCosta, artist.
name: Danger in Deep Space Part 4

description: Denizens of the undergrounds abduct the Coopers into the world below.
Damon is trapped by the carnivals ringleader, but the real danger comes from a source much closer to home.
name: Circus of Souls Part 2 of 3

description: The blood continues to flow but has the murderer finally been caught? And is Detective Gorely putting his career on the line by standing up for the nasties? The answers lie ahead.

Lone Going

Now that the hornet's nest has been kicked, Ethan Ronald has some culling to do before the full moon. However, the vampires have other ways of striking back during the day.
name: Lone Going

description: More than six months have passed. Being the only person who fully knows what happened that day, Detective Rose Yancey now carries dark secrets of her own.
name: Volume 2: Jacked Up

description: The Adventures of Track Suit man is the on-going saga of a frequent flier who puts himself first. By first I mean he'll use any means necessary to board the plane before anyone else. Be warned this is NOT a traditional comic book. This is a chronicle of adventures told through the use of social media. For almost a year Track Suit Man posts have gained momentum ultimately becoming a viral topic. Finally these stories were collected here in a one-shot book for comic lovers to enjoy

volume.name: The Adventures of Track Suit Man

description:
Anne Manx "Birth of the Cat", a gripping "origins" story where Anne first meets her arch-enemy Jean Richmond and her doomed lover Jack Reynolds.

Anne Manx "Birth of the Cat", is the prequel story to the popular Anne Manx audio series and tells the story of how Anne Manx and Jean Richmond met while at the intergalactic police academy.

volume.name: Anne Manx: Birth of the Cat

description: Asreeth Lion Warrior - The Lion's Roar collects the first season of the webcomic created, written and illustrated by Rene Arreola. Bonus material includes a full gallery of the original black and white inked artwork along with select pencilled pages. Over 70 pages combined!
name: Volume 1

volume.name: Asreeth Lion Warrior: The Lion's Roar

description:
October 30th, 2151. Devil's Night.

Traditionally a celebration of havoc, the night before Halloween has long been dedicated to spray paint and fire, to destruction for its own sake. The impulse behind this frenzied holiday is alive and well in the 22nd century.

But mischief in the Age of Nanotechnology is complicated. For young vandals Bardo, Shiyu, and Dwyer, visionary tactics may not be enough. To keep the spirit of their egg-throwing forebears alight, perilous alchemy is required. Unleashing such power will bring enemies, and open an abyss that could swallow its makers whole...
name: TPB

description: London 1942. The true horror wasn't from the air or in the streets...it was underground. As German bombs pummel the city of London, the leaves of autumn begin to fall and so do the victims. A young boy's fascination with a local serial killer will plunge himself into a life-long obsession. The story of Autumn is a number of things: a coming of age story, a tale of revenge, a study in obsession, and a post war Gothic horror story. Set in and under London, the main characters are not the victims, the hero, or even the serial killer, but the dark labyrinth underground. After nine years of autumnal atrocities, James Turrell descends into the black abyss of the Underground, believing himself fully prepared and ready to confront the object of his obsession. But he is wrong...
name: TPB

description:
Shockwave

After impulse the world on the earth does not look as we used to see it today. Genetically changed half-human species inhabit the planet's surface. Dangerous creatures propagated enormously and threatened the humanity. In order to be in safe people have built cities on top of former ones. And here in high inaccessibility from the beasts people survive and live their lives. But peace was disturbed by explosion of one of the bearings.
name: Shockwave

description: A veteran bounty hunter in the Old West on his way to deliver a dead bounty happens to come across a woman and her son on their way to California. The bounty decides to ride with them as they are being threatened by bandits who are hoping to take their land claim. Additional tale of an Indian scout for the US Cavalry who, while serving for the army, returns to find his village has been wiped out by renegade soldiers.

volume.name: Bounty and Navarro: Tales of the Old West

description: Burnard is a bunyip living in a billabong. He has good water to swim in and lots of tasty food to eat. But even a mythical creature can get lonely - follow Burnard as he ventures out into the world to find a friend.

The Weapon Minus Program has been reopened, and Captain America has become unhinged thanks to the mad machinations of the twisted Dr. Mindbubble! Jet Black, daughter of criminal mastermind Arnim Zola, allies with the Falcon - but when the mysterious and powerful Iron Nail begins assassinating the heads of the world's five largest corporations, they must make a terrible choice! Meanwhile, can Captain America put a lid on Dr. Mindbubble, or will the villain shatter Cap's already-fragile psyche? And what happens when S.H.I.E.L.D.'s greatest secrets are revealed to the world's most dangerous man? Captain America lays a final sacrifice on the altar of freedom as he takes on the Iron Nail - and is broken! This is the day when it all changes; this is the beginning of the end for Steve Rogers. Collecting CAPTAIN AMERICA (2012) #16-21.
name: Volume 4

description:
Following the direction of the fallen star from the conclusion of Cavewoman: Journey #2, Meriem and Klyde discover that the meteor isn't what they thought it was. Back in town, the merciless gang leader Blackstone has Professor Cook marked for death by a former marine, now mercenary, called 'Tripwire.' Unaware of this, the Prof. and Corporal Mack continue their search to find Meriem, hoping to bring her home and back to Bruce whom she believes is still dead.

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
ACover ARob Durham1
BCover BRob Durham2
CCover CRob DurhamMissing
DCover DBudd Root3
ESpecial Edition Nude CoverBudd Root4

The ghoulish monsters and sexy seductresses known as the Darkstalkers are back! Morrigan, Demitri, Bishamon, and Donovan are joined by newcomers like Huitzil, Anakaris, Sasquatch, and Q-Bee. It's man VS demon, robot VS mummy, succubus VS vampire, and more, as the creatures of the night battle for control of the darkness!
name: TPB

description: For all manga Debaser readers, here is an extra digital episodes to get to know your heros better!

The woman Armando falls in love with is the former fiance of his deceased cousin. He is a charismatic doctor in an Argentinian hospital. Laura is full of passion and excitement about her new job that she got through her lover, Diego. However, the moment she meets Armando, she is not only disrespected, she's not even allowed to do her job. Could she really have been admiring someone like that all this time? What Laura doesnt notice is the flame of lust hidden within Armando's heart....
name: Vol. 1

description: From Disney darling to shock pop princess, Miley Cyrus has enjoyed a bombastic career that crosses genres. A musician, singer, writer, and actress, Miley Cyrus has become an icon to tweens searching for their identity and to teens who have grown up with their idol, the effervescent Hannah Montana.

Presenting a faithful adaptation of the classic novel from Mary Shelley. Based on the original story itself rather than the various cinematic films, this is a rendition of Frankenstein, the haunting and sophisticated tale that you have not seen before. Frankenstein (the name of the doctor and not of the monster itself!) is truly one of the great tragedies of literature. Shunned by his creator, the monster is forced to find acceptance in a world that is both confusing and frightening to him. The monster becomes enraged at the treatment that he receives and seeks revenge against mankind which has rejected and tormented him merely because he was different. Join writer Eric Jackson and artist Charles Yates as they delve into the psychological horror that is Frankenstein. Collects the entire series.
name: TPB

description:
Gods Will Be Watching

The universe is on the brink of disaster and the fledgling Xenolifer organization is at odds with those in power. Follow the events leading up to conflict in Gods Will Be Watching and come to understand the rise of Xenolifer from band of renegades to one of the most powerful and influential terrorist groups in the galaxy.

About the Game

Gods Will Be Watching is a minimalistic point and click thriller centered on despair, commitment, and sacrifice as players face narrative puzzles and moral dilemmas that will affect both the lives of your team and the people you're are sworn to protect. Set against the backdrop of an interstellar struggle, Gods Will Be Watching follows Sgt. Burden and his crew in six tense chapters from hostage situations and wilderness survival to biological weapon prevention and agonizing torture scenarios. Each decision is crucial and players will need to choose between the lives of their team and the saving the world from genocide. There's no good or evil, just decisions, with only you and the gods as a judge to your actions.

Liesel Van Helsing's life of hunting down vampires is shaken up when a mysterious package shows up at her door. Inside it is an old journal written by her father, the famed vampire hunter, Abraham Van Helsing. Desperate to find out who sent her the book, Liesel discovers a clue which leads her on a voyage to Europe. What she doesn't know is that her journey is being manipulated by her father's greatest nemesis. This 152 page trade paperback collects together Zenescope's hit comic book series, Grimm Fairy Tales Helsing issues 1 through 4.
name: TPB

volume.name: Grimm Fairy Tales presents Helsing: The Darkness and the Light

description: An adaptation of the classic Grimm's fairy tale tells the story of lonesome Rapunzel, a girl taken from her family and raised in a remote castle where her long, luxurious hair is used by her wicked captor as the only means of entrance!
A mysterious man stops a human sacrifice and realizes his past.

JFH: Knuckle Sandwich Edition collects issues 0-4, with several redux pages, plus TONS of bonus content that links the JFH Universe between the critically acclaimed comics, films, videos, and animations. If you love martial arts action and cool characters, this is the collection for you.

This is the perfect collection for JFH fans and newcomers alike. JFH: Knuckle Sandwich Edition takes you from the vigilante days of Retribution to the legalized phenomenon it becomes. If you need justice, JFH is the crew.
name: TPB

volume.name: JFH: Justice For Hire - Knuckle Sandwich Edition

description: Bizarro sci-fi, action-adventure tale about a rotund gun-for-hire and his adventures in the town called Ink-blot. Influenced by comics like Judge Dredd and Strontium Dog and authors like Steve Aylett and Philip K Dick, its a starkly satirical take on what happens when digital tech and old fashion bastard-narcissism meet.

The band gets arrested after breaking into a high-schooler's house. After a concert, they meet a mysterious woman named Lucy, who makes them an offer they're too drunk to refuse.

Black/white interior pages.

DEATH IS COMING. BUT A MAN'S WORD. CAN'T. BE. STOPPED. --

Follow the Tale of "Los Hombres Del Calaca", the most notorious gang in Mexico, as they come back from the dead for one last heist!

I'm curious as to how far you've gone with your new lover since you left my side, Sandro tells Polly. Three years ago Polly fell in love with him while working as a tour guide in Italy. But one day, a man calling himself Sandro's representative showed up suddenly and told her she would have to leave Sandro. After that she wanted to forget about him, but then they suddenly meet again! He's become even more attractive since they were togetherbut she won't let herself get carried away and repeat the same mistake again!
name: Vol. 1

description: When Nel finds out her nineteen-year-old niece, who has just received a college scholarship and has her whole life ahead of her, is suddenly married, Nel hurries off to Spain to meet with her niece's partner, Luis. But she can only find his cousin, who has the same name. He suggests to a bewildered Nel that if they pretend to be engaged for his ill grandmother, she might tell them where the couple is. Pretending to be engaged to such an arrogant man? No way! However, with no other leads on the whereabouts of her niece, Nel has no choice but to rely on Luis. So Nel reluctantly slips on the family ring that has been passed on for generations.
name: Vol. 1

volume.name: Mistress: Pregnant By the Spanish Billionaire

description: Cool, friendly Mariya is the undisputed king of his year! But why does he always hang around with shy and painfully awkward "Mr. Mannequin" Nachi? Can these boys withstand the non-stop judgment of a school filled with jealous rivals and confused classmates? A New Season of Young Leaves follows every sweet high and lonely low in the growing relationship of unlikely best friends. How will the most popular guy in class deal when his wallflower confidant suddenly steals the social spotlightand a beautiful girl's affection?
name: Vol. 1

volume.name: A New Season of Young Leaves

description: God calls Noah to build a great ark in preparation for a great flood.

Subject K - Part 1

Subject K is interrogated, experimented on and imprisoned by the mysterious Pale Man.
name: Subject K: Part 1

description: A quest to salvage a lost ship sets in motion a saga sprawling forward and backward through time, with a universe of horror drawn to one worldand a fantastic team of writers and artists have gathered to tell the tale. Spread across four different titles, with a final chapter coming from Kelly Sue DeConnick, Fire and Stone starts here, in four intro chapters from the first issues of Prometheus, Aliens, AVP & Predator.

volume.name: Prometheus: Fire and Stone - SDCC 2014 Ashcan

description: A supernatural, dark and gritty graphic novel about a thief searching for buried treasure who must overcome his greed in order to escape from a Mexican ghost town.
name: GN

description: The Remaining is an action-packed supernatural thriller that addresses questions of life, love and belief against an apocalyptic backdrop. A group of close friends gather for a wedding, but the celebration is shattered by a series of cataclysmic events and enemies foretold by biblical end-times prophecies. The survivors face a horrifying, uncertain future as they scramble for safety, but as their world collapses around them in chaos and terror will they choose real life through faith, or just try to survive?
name: GN
